title: StartUp Conclave 2025
description: Annual flagship event featuring industry leaders, investors, and successful entrepreneurs sharing insights on building sustainable startups.
fullDescription: Join us for our biggest event of the year where we bring together the brightest minds in entrepreneurship. Network with investors, learn from successful founders, and pitch your ideas to a panel of experts.

title: E-Cell Stall at MARVEL Open Day
description: Interactive E-Cell stall featuring business quizzes and financial analysis activities.
fullDescription: E-Cell UVCE hosted an interactive stall during MARVEL Open Day with activities like Guess the Logo and balance sheet analysis. The stall received the highest footfall and helped students understand branding and financial fundamentals.

title: Learn to Trade Workshop
description: Pre-event workshop focused on stock market fundamentals and trading strategies.
fullDescription: Conducted by alumnus Shubham Kumar M, this workshop prepared students for Bull Market 6.0 by simplifying trading concepts, market dynamics, and strategic thinking.

title: Bull Market 6.0
description: National-level virtual stock trading competition with participants from across India.
fullDescription: Organised in collaboration with StockGro, Bull Market 6.0 saw 547 participants competing in a 48-hour virtual trading challenge, enhancing real-time market decision-making skills.

title: Members Meet and Greet
description: Interactive session with members and Bull Market winners sharing experiences.
fullDescription: The session featured award distribution, insights from Bull Market winners, stock market discussions, and an address by the faculty coordinator, fostering collaboration and learning.

title: Start-Up to Win Workshop
description: Three-day entrepreneurship workshop led by industry leaders and alumni.
fullDescription: Led by Mr. B.V. Jagadeesh and UVCE alumni, the workshop covered startup storytelling, market segmentation, customer acquisition, technology evolution, and career guidance through panel discussions.

title: Fiesta Quiz Stall
description: Business and general awareness quiz conducted during the cultural fest Fiesta.
fullDescription: E-Cell UVCE hosted an interactive Mentimeter-based quiz covering business and finance topics. Winners received goodies, and the event added vibrancy to the fest.

title: Dropshipping Decoded
description: Session on building e-commerce businesses using the dropshipping model.
fullDescription: Ankit Patra, Founder & CEO of Magnova, explained the dropshipping business model, its advantages, risks, and practical strategies for building scalable e-commerce ventures.

title: Becoming The Best You
description: Self-improvement and productivity session by entrepreneur Ishan Sharma.
fullDescription: Ishan Sharma shared insights on goal setting, time management, upskilling, and personal growth, inspiring students to build disciplined and impactful careers.

title: Find Your Spark
description: Personal branding and career development workshop by alumnus Pratik Shanbhag.
fullDescription: The workshop focused on personal branding, LinkedIn presence, placement strategies, and concluded with a 21-day challenge encouraging consistent personal branding efforts.

title: Jaathre Club Expo Stall
description: Interactive stall introducing juniors to entrepreneurship and industry sectors.
fullDescription: E-Cell UVCE conducted quizzes and industry-guessing games to introduce first-year students to entrepreneurship, rewarding participation with chocolates and badges.

title: Web3 & Blockchain Workshop
description: Hands-on workshop exploring Web3 and blockchain fundamentals.
fullDescription: In collaboration with IIT Bombay startup SwapSo, the workshop covered blockchain basics, Web3 concepts, live demos, and included certificates and discounts for participants.

title: Strategy Sprint
description: Case study competition focused on strategic and analytical problem-solving.
fullDescription: Teams analyzed real-world business case studies and presented innovative solutions, evaluated by industry experts, enhancing strategic thinking and presentation skills.
